game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map points to the location of a long-lost artifact. Locate and retrieve it to gain a great reward.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon blueprint

task.objective: Travel to the Ruins of Eldoria
task.description: Make your way to the ruins located in the western part of the kingdom.

task.objective: Search for clues about the artifact's location
task.description: Sift through the ruins and find any information that might lead to the artifact.
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. Defeat it to claim the treasure.
